name: sfpwowerscripts-createsourcepackage-task
friendlyName: Creates a new  version of  Source Based Repo
description: Creates a new  version of  Source Based Repo ,This task is part of DX@Scale/SFPowerscripts
helpMarkDown: This task simulates a packaging experience similar to unlocking packaging, just by writing the commit id to an artifact. It is basically to help with the release pipelines
author: azlam.abdulsalam
instanceNameFormat: Creates a new version of source baed repo for $(package)

inputs.name: package
inputs.label: Alias of the package
inputs.helpMarkDown: ID (starts with 0Ho) or alias of the package to create a version of

inputs.name: version_number
inputs.label: the version number of the package to be crated
inputs.helpMarkDown: The format is major.minor.patch.buildnumber . This will override the build number mentioned in the sfdx-project.json, Try considering the use of Increment Version Number task before this task

inputs.name: project_directory
inputs.label: Project Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: The project directory should contain a sfdx-project.json for this command to succeed
